attributes.action: Tough measures to make sure our foreign aid reaches the poor not to fund corrupt governments
attributes.additional_details:
The newspapers are reporting today that UK gives £19million aid to South Africa whilst its president spends £17.5million on his palace

This country is on its knees but we still continue to give money in good faith.  We need accountabiilty and transparency of how this money is spent.  All of the money that has been pumped into trying to save lives in 3rd world countries is all fruitless unless something is done about this corruption.
